name: Prime Garden
description:
A simple 2d block puzzle game.

In this game you push blocks to get to the next area.

This is a prototype. Made completely with SDL2 and Common Lisp (SBCL) as a proof of concept. Note that if you have technical issues running the game, please run the prime_garden.exe file in a command line and copy-paste the error message that appears and send it to me via comments or other.
